author: Rob Copeland
title: Steven A. Cohen’s Investment Firm Sued for Discrimination By Female Staffer
text:
A female employee at Steven A. Cohen’s private investment firm filed a discrimination lawsuit Monday, alleging unfair pay practices and a pervasively sexist work environment.
Lauren Bonner, an internal recruiter at Mr. Cohen’s Point72 Asset Management, accused the firm of paying her as much as two-thirds less than her male counterparts. Ms. Bonner was slated to earn $450,000 last year, including a bonus, according to the lawsuit filed in federal court in Manhattan.
